nodes.bodyText: You could use [^\\w] here instead; that would additionally allow underscores , but that seems reasonable to me.
@cygnus-x-1 yeah but an _ is a special character right? I'd prefer to leave this as is if that's ok?
@cygnus-x-1 (re-sending in case you missed it) did you prefer this still be changed or happy as is?
I'm fine with it if you are.
